author: Warhammer
description:
Marneus Calgar is a legendary hero who takes every opportunity to strike at the enemies of the Imperium with righteous fury, and what better way to show off this mighty warrior than to paint him! Join Dan as he goes through each step to get Calgar looking his best, ready to take on the Imperium’s foes!

Here’s a list of the paints we used in today’s video:

Contrast:
Basilicanum Grey
Black Legion
Ultramarines Blue
Skeleton Horde

Base:
Celestra Grey
Iron Hands Steel
Macragge Blue
Retributor Armour

Layer:
Calgar Blue
Evil Sunz Scarlet
Fenrisian Grey
Fire Dragon Bright
Liberator Gold
Stormhost Silver
Ulthuan Grey
Tuskgor Fur
White Scar

Shade:
Reikland Fleshshade

Technical:
Lahmian Medium

Tools:
Small Base STC
Small Layer STC 
Sub-Assembly Holders
If you enjoyed this and want to learn more, our YouTube channel has an array of beginner-friendly videos to get you started.


Follow for more Warhammer, more often:

- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/warhammerofficial/
- Threads: http
title: How to Paint Marneus Calgar in the Armour of Antilochus | Warhammer 40,000
